title: Georgia trying to enact drone restrictions
text:
02 Georgia trying to enact drone restrictions 
That Drone Show: Earlier this year, District 48 State Rep. Harry Geisinger, R-Roswell, introduced a bill to the Georgia General Assembly addressing unmanned aerial vehicles, more commonly known as drones.The bill, which ultimately faltered, dealt with privacy concerns stemming from civilian use of consumer-grade drones.
